page.name: ace/impl-doc/sql
page.summary: Almost all components of a SQL statement are automatically captured and documented within ACE. This includes a list of all the SQL statements used througout the application, the parameters they require, and any views that may be attached to them.

tr.td: All of the SQL statements that are externalized in XML files appear in a single ACE page. Programmers and manager can use this view to review all the SQL statements that are used in an application. In addition to the actual SQL statements, performance metrics accompany each SQL statement indicating the number of times each statement is execute and the average/maximum time (in milliseconds) it took to execute the statement.

Each SQL statement may be unit tested inside ACE to ensure that user requirements are being met. As soon as the XML is completed, the test harness is automatically created and may be executed by anyone with access to ACE. The statement, along with any reports/views can be tested without creating any additional code.
